content.name: memoryModule
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about memory modules in the storage system.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the memory module.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot number where the memory module is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the memory module needs replacement Values are:
  • true - Memory module needs replacement.
  • false - Memory module does not need replacement.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the memory module.

attributes.name: parentStorageProcessor
attributes.description: Parent storage processor of the memory module.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the memory module instance.

attributes.name: firmwareVersion
attributes.description: Firmware version number for the memory module.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the memory module.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the memory module.

attributes.name: isInserted
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the memory module is inserted:
  • true - Memory module is inserted.
  • false - Memory module is not inserted.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the memory module's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the memory module.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the memory module, as defined by the health resource  type.
